7 songs for free and then it‚Äôs like a dollar per song. I would pay $4.99 for all 100+ songs, but a dollar a song is ridiculous. It‚Äôs a shame too, this game was pretty fun before a realized it was a money cow.

title.label: One of The Best‚Ñ¢Ô∏è but costly

content.label:
I‚Äôve been playing this game for a year or so and have played the arcade version. This is by far one of the best rhythm games in the App Store, but I got some serious problems with it and paid dlc. Each set of 4 songs is around 5-6$ which doesn‚Äôt seem like a lot but when all of your arcade favorites (looking at you knight of nights) it stacks up pretty fast. Not only that, but the DLC doesn‚Äôt have all of the songs compared to the PC port of this game (there‚Äôs undertale dlc...UNDERTALE!)

When more songs get implemented, either for free or for price, and hopefully cheaper. I‚Äôll give it some stars back.

title.label: Timing of taps and music are off

content.label: I just recently opened the game, and it seems like the music is no longer matching up to the taps you punch to play and score. The music seems to be dragging behind their corresponding taps, so the rhythms are all off. PLEASE FIX THIS, I LOVE THIS GAME AND ITS SONGS.

title.label: They locked me out of content I already paid for

content.label:
Basically title
The song packs are fairly expensive, so I could only justify paying for one that has my favorite song. 
After getting a new phone, I re-download and recover the app to get my songs back
Only to find half of the difficulties(the ones with the good mechanics) no longer there and an ‚Äúadd arcade mode‚Äù button, which takes you to the store where I need to pay for it AGAIN, and would only cover this song. 

Don‚Äôt get me wrong, I love the game, although the app could use a lot of work

But if I paid for it once why would you pull an H1Z1 and split the game up? At least THEY gave the owners of the original game access to the content they could access before

Bigger select buttons to make it easier to pause the game, collect achievements, etc. That‚Äôs all I got so far.

All the vocaloid packs so far are of high quality! Keep up the great work. Fix the music packs that cannot be purchased yet because that really confuses me.

Groove Coaster 2 is my favorite rhythm game on the iOS store, and I haven‚Äôt found a single one that compares to the fun, immersive, and fairly forgiving gameplay, or even the awesome soundtrack available. 

I honestly can‚Äôt find another game on the app store that, all puns and the first game aside, hits the same notes as Groove Coaster 2. One major factor that really sells this game to me is how it handles missed beats. Rather than kicking you out of the game after missing a few notes on a song you‚Äôve never heard/played before, it lets you keep playing AND records a replay of your best run. This is great for players who are new to rhythm games and seasoned veterans alike as it gives you a chance to learn a song without some infuriating trial-and-error sensation. That‚Äôs not to say the game is easy, however. There are tracks that I, as a level 190 player who spent countless hours getting Full Chains and S++ ranks, cannot get past an A rank at best. So if you are one of those rhythm game masochists, you can just pay $4.99 for song packs that go up to a difficulty rank of 20. 

On top of that, the soundtrack you get right out of the box starts a little slow, but gets better as you play and level up. In the store there are hundreds of different tracks available, with three great tracks for free download. Even so, some of the best songs do have a fee attached, but when a massive 30-track pack goes on sale, it‚Äôs more than worth forking over some cash.

This game is my favorite mobile game by far, and it is just so much fun and enjoyable. Can't tell you how many times I got addicted to this game. One of the best rhythm games I've ever played. Try it!

I used to love this game, played arcade mode on hard all the time. With the last update double horizontal swipes have become nearly impossible, forcing me to use items so I can finish with a full chain. I hope this is fixed.

Groove coaster on iOS is one of my favorite rhythm games that I have ever played. The music is enthralling and amazing, the charts are spectacularly designed, the avatars are cool, the game's whole theme is completely innovative, and best of all, you get some great tracks for completely free! However, groove coaster' best content lies in the purchasable packs, where you can find content unmatched in difficulty for all of the rhythm game masochists (like myself) to enjoy. However, this does require some price commitment from you, so I greatly recommend signing up for a taito ID. However, the price is a small penalty when what you get is so good. Songs like Satisfaction, Stronger, DX Choseinou Full Metal Shojo, and literally everything in the touhou and kagerou project sets make this a worthy pickup for any self-respecting rhythm game player

This is a really great game, and I'm surprised how it's not more recognize. The music is good, the beats are very inSync, and the roller coaster theme just adds to what makes it challengingly fun! If you like tech music, you'll definitely like this game. ‚≠êÔ∏è
